title: Native American Spirits and Demons
description:
Native American culture has a strong connection to the physical world, and the world beyond. Disturbances to the dead are disrespectful and are believed to bring suffering to the family of the departed. It will also bring great pain, even death to those who dare mess with any Native American spirit, dead or alive.

First, obsession that destroys you
Followed by humans, the worst kind of evil
Then, the teeniest things bring the greatest danger
Finally in our featured story, being brave enough to die

Worry less and feel happier. Sign up for your trial at noom.com/SCARY
